dcterms:description: Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) is a method that allows AI systems to learn from human feedback, enhancing their ability to align with human values and intentions.

dcterms:description: Reinforcement Learning with Human Teachers is a method that incorporates guidance from human teachers to improve the learning performance of AI systems.
